name: Piano Keyboard
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="pianoGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(20,20,20);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="whiteKeyGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="50" y="200" width="412" height="150" fill="url(#pianoGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="60" y="210" width="392" height="60" fill="url(#whiteKeyGrad)" />
  <rect x="110" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="140" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="190" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="220" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="250" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="300" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="330" y="210" width="20" height="40" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Acoustic Guitar
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="guitarGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="100" fill="url(#guitarGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="246" y="100" width="20" height="250" fill="url(#guitarGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="30" fill="#333333" />
  <path d="M 246 100 L 266 100 L 266 50 L 246 50 Z" fill="url(#guitarGrad)" />
  <path d="M 106 350 Q 256 340, 406 350" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
</svg>

name: Snare Drum
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <linearGradient id="drumShellGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">

      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,140,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="drumSkinGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />

  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="200" rx="150" ry="20" fill="url(#drumSkinGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="106" y="200" width="300" height="100" fill="url(#drumShellGrad)" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="150" ry="20" fill="#A0A0A0" />
</svg>

name: Trumpet

  <circle cx="225" cy="200" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="225" cy="250" r="10" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Maraca (Shaker)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

  <rect x="231" y="200" width="50" height="200" fill="url(#maracaHandleGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Microphone
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

name: Clarinet
svg_content:
